string.name: Questions
string.br: 1. Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and arms down at your sides.
2. Take a step forward with your right leg and bend your right knee as you do so
3. Push up off your right foot and return to the starting position. Repeat with your left leg. This is one rep.

resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
